Class.Name: NSLayoutManager
Class.Description: An object that coordinates the layout and display of text characters.

InstanceMethods.Name: init
InstanceMethods.Description: Initializes a newly created layout manager object.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithCoder:
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates a layout manager from data in an unarchiver.

InstanceMethods.Name: replaceTextStorage:
InstanceMethods.Description: Replaces the layout manager's current text storage object with the specified object.

InstanceMethods.Name: addTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Appends the specified text container to the series of text containers where the layout manager arranges text.

InstanceMethods.Name: insertTextContainer:atIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Inserts a text container at the specified index in the list of text containers.

InstanceMethods.Name: removeTextContainerAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Removes the text container at the specified index and invalidates the layout as necessary.

InstanceMethods.Name: setTextContainer:forGlyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Associates a text container with the specified range of glyphs.

InstanceMethods.Name: textContainerChangedGeometry:
InstanceMethods.Description: Invalidates the layout information, and possibly glyphs, for the specified text container and all subsequent text container objects.

InstanceMethods.Name: textContainerChangedTextView:
InstanceMethods.Description: Updates the information necessary to manage text view objects for the specified text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: textContainerForGlyphAtIndex:effectiveRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the text container that manages the layout for the specified glyph, causing layout to happen as necessary.

InstanceMethods.Name: textContainerForGlyphAtIndex:effectiveRange:withoutAdditionalLayout:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the text container that manages the layout for the specified glyph.

InstanceMethods.Name: usedRectForTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the bounding rectangle for the glyphs in the specified text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: invalidateDisplayForCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Invalidates display for the specified character range.

InstanceMethods.Name: invalidateDisplayForGlyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Invalidates a range of glyphs, requiring new layout information, and updates the appropriate regions of any text views that display those glyphs.

InstanceMethods.Name: invalidateGlyphsForCharacterRange:changeInLength:actualCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Invalidates and adjusts the glyphs in the specified character range.

InstanceMethods.Name: invalidateLayoutForCharacterRange:actualCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Invalidates the layout information for the glyphs that map to the specified character range.

InstanceMethods.Name: processEditingForTextStorage:edited:range:changeInLength:invalidatedRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Notifies the layout manager when an edit action changes the contents of its text storage object.

InstanceMethods.Name: ensureGlyphsForCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Forces the layout manager to generate glyphs for the specified character range if it hasn’t already.

InstanceMethods.Name: ensureGlyphsForGlyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Forces the layout manager to generate glyphs for the specified glyph range if it hasn’t already.

InstanceMethods.Name: ensureLayoutForBoundingRect:inTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Forces the layout manager to perform layout for the specified area in the specified text container if it hasn’t already.

InstanceMethods.Name: ensureLayoutForCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Forces the layout manager to perform layout for the specified character range if it hasn’t already.

InstanceMethods.Name: ensureLayoutForGlyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Forces the layout manager to perform layout for the specified glyph range if it hasn’t already.

InstanceMethods.Name: ensureLayoutForTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Forces the layout manager to perform layout for the specified text container if it hasn’t already.

InstanceMethods.Name: getGlyphsInRange:glyphs:properties:characterIndexes:bidiLevels:
InstanceMethods.Description: Fills a passed-in buffer with a sequence of glyphs.

InstanceMethods.Name: CGGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the glyph at the specified index.

InstanceMethods.Name: CGGlyphAtIndex:isValidIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the glyph at the specified index along with information about whether the glyph index is valid.

InstanceMethods.Name: setGlyphs:properties:characterIndexes:font:forGlyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Stores the initial glyphs and glyph properties for a character range.
InstanceMethods.Declaration:
- (void)setGlyphs:(const CGGlyph *)glyphs 
       properties:(const NSGlyphProperty *)props 
 characterIndexes:(const NSUInteger *)charIndexes 
             font:(UIFont *)aFont 
    forGlyphRange:(NSRange)glyphRange;

InstanceMethods.Name: characterIndexForGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the index in the text storage for the first character of the specified glyph.

InstanceMethods.Name: glyphIndexForCharacterAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the index of the first glyph of the character at the specified index.

InstanceMethods.Name: isValidGlyphIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Indicates whether the specified index refers to a valid glyph.

InstanceMethods.Name: propertyForGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the glyph property of the glyph at the specified index.

InstanceMethods.Name: setAttachmentSize:forGlyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the size to use when drawing a glyph that represents an attachment.

InstanceMethods.Name: setDrawsOutsideLineFragment:forGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Indicates whether the specified glyph exceeds the bounds of the line fragment for its layout.

InstanceMethods.Name: setExtraLineFragmentRect:usedRect:textContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the bounds and container for the extra line fragment.

InstanceMethods.Name: setLineFragmentRect:forGlyphRange:usedRect:
InstanceMethods.Description: Associates the line fragment bounds for the specified range of glyphs.

InstanceMethods.Name: setLocation:forStartOfGlyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the location for the first glyph in the specified range.

InstanceMethods.Name: setNotShownAttribute:forGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the visibility of the glyph at the specified index.

InstanceMethods.Name: attachmentSizeForGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the size of the attachment glyph at the specified index.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawsOutsideLineFragmentForGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Indicates whether the glyph draws outside its line fragment rectangle.

InstanceMethods.Name: firstUnlaidCharacterIndex
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the index for the first character in the layout manager that isn’t in the layout.

InstanceMethods.Name: firstUnlaidGlyphIndex
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the index for the first glyph in the layout manager that isn’t in the layout.

InstanceMethods.Name: getFirstUnlaidCharacterIndex:glyphIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the indexes for the first character and glyph that have invalid layout information.

InstanceMethods.Name: lineFragmentRectForGlyphAtIndex:effectiveRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the rectangle for the line fragment where the glyph lies and (optionally), by reference, the entire range of glyphs in that fragment.

InstanceMethods.Name: lineFragmentRectForGlyphAtIndex:effectiveRange:withoutAdditionalLayout:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the line fragment rectangle that contains the glyph at the specified glyph index.

InstanceMethods.Name: lineFragmentUsedRectForGlyphAtIndex:effectiveRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the usage rectangle for the line fragment and (optionally) returns the entire range of glyphs in that fragment.

InstanceMethods.Name: lineFragmentUsedRectForGlyphAtIndex:effectiveRange:withoutAdditionalLayout:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the usage rectangle for the line fragment and (optionally) returns the entire range of glyphs in that fragment.

InstanceMethods.Name: locationForGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the location for the specified glyph within its line fragment.

InstanceMethods.Name: notShownAttributeForGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Indicates whether the glyph at the specified index has a visible representation.

InstanceMethods.Name: truncatedGlyphRangeInLineFragmentForGlyphAtIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the range of truncated glyphs for a line fragment that contains the specified index.

InstanceMethods.Name: boundingRectForGlyphRange:inTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the bounding rectangle for the specified glyphs in a container.

InstanceMethods.Name: characterIndexForPoint:inTextContainer:fractionOfDistanceBetweenInsertionPoints:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the index of the character that lies beneath the specified point using the specified container's coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: characterRangeForGlyphRange:actualGlyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the range of characters that correspond to the glyphs in the specified glyph range.

InstanceMethods.Name: enumerateEnclosingRectsForGlyphRange:withinSelectedGlyphRange:inTextContainer:usingBlock:
InstanceMethods.Description: Enumerates enclosing rectangles for the specified glyph range in a text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: enumerateLineFragmentsForGlyphRange:usingBlock:
InstanceMethods.Description: Enumerates line fragments intersecting with the specified glyph range.
InstanceMethods.Declaration:
- (void)enumerateLineFragmentsForGlyphRange:(NSRange)glyphRange 
                                 usingBlock:(void (^)(CGRect rect, CGRect usedRect, NSTextContainer *textContainer, NSRange glyphRange, BOOL *stop))block;

InstanceMethods.Name: fractionOfDistanceThroughGlyphForPoint:inTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the fraction of the distance between the glyph at the specified point and the next glyph.

InstanceMethods.Name: getLineFragmentInsertionPointsForCharacterAtIndex:alternatePositions:inDisplayOrder:positions:characterIndexes:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns insertion points in bulk for a specified line fragment.

InstanceMethods.Name: glyphIndexForPoint:inTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the index of the glyph at the specified location in a text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: glyphIndexForPoint:inTextContainer:fractionOfDistanceThroughGlyph:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the index of the glyph at the specified point using the container's coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: glyphRangeForBoundingRect:inTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the smallest contiguous range for glyphs lying wholly or partially within the specified rectangle of the text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: glyphRangeForBoundingRectWithoutAdditionalLayout:inTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the smallest contiguous range for glyphs lying wholly or partially within the specified rectangle of the text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: glyphRangeForTextContainer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the range of glyphs lying within the specified text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: glyphRangeForCharacterRange:actualCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the range of glyphs that the specified range of characters generates.

InstanceMethods.Name: rangeOfNominallySpacedGlyphsContainingIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the range of displayable glyphs that surround the glyph at the specified index.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawBackgroundForGlyphRange:atPoint:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws background marks for the specified glyphs, which must lie completely within a single text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawGlyphsForGlyphRange:atPoint:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws the specified glyphs, which must lie completely within a single text container.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawStrikethroughForGlyphRange:strikethroughType:baselineOffset:lineFragmentRect:lineFragmentGlyphRange:containerOrigin:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws a strikethrough for the specified glyphs.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawUnderlineForGlyphRange:underlineType:baselineOffset:lineFragmentRect:lineFragmentGlyphRange:containerOrigin:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws underlining for the glyphs in a specified range.

InstanceMethods.Name: fillBackgroundRectArray:count:forCharacterRange:color:
InstanceMethods.Description: Fills background rectangles with a color.

InstanceMethods.Name: showCGGlyphs:positions:count:font:textMatrix:attributes:inContext:
InstanceMethods.Description: Renders the glyphs at the specified positions, using the specified attributes.
InstanceMethods.Declaration:
- (void)showCGGlyphs:(const CGGlyph *)glyphs 
           positions:(const CGPoint *)positions 
               count:(NSInteger)glyphCount 
                font:(UIFont *)font 
          textMatrix:(CGAffineTransform)textMatrix 
          attributes:(NSDictionary<NSAttributedStringKey, id> *)attributes 
           inContext:(CGContextRef)CGContext;

InstanceMethods.Name: strikethroughGlyphRange:strikethroughType:lineFragmentRect:lineFragmentGlyphRange:containerOrigin:
InstanceMethods.Description: Calculates and draws strikethrough for the specified glyphs.

InstanceMethods.Name: underlineGlyphRange:underlineType:lineFragmentRect:lineFragmentGlyphRange:containerOrigin:
InstanceMethods.Description: Calculates subranges to underline for the specified glyphs and draws the underlining as appropriate.

InstanceMethods.Name: setLayoutRect:forTextBlock:glyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the layout rectangle that encloses the specified text block and glyph range.

InstanceMethods.Name: layoutRectForTextBlock:glyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the rectangle for the layout of the specified text block and glyph range.

InstanceMethods.Name: setBoundsRect:forTextBlock:glyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the bounding rectangle that encloses the specified text block and glyph range.

InstanceMethods.Name: boundsRectForTextBlock:glyphRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the specified text block and glyph range.

InstanceMethods.Name: layoutRectForTextBlock:atIndex:effectiveRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the rectangle for the layout of the specified text block and glyph.

InstanceMethods.Name: boundsRectForTextBlock:atIndex:effectiveRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the bounding rectangle for the specified text block and glyph.

InstanceMethods.Name: showAttachmentCell:inRect:characterIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws an attachment cell.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerAccessoryViewForTextView:paragraphStyle:ruler:enabled:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the accessory view that the text system uses for its ruler.

InstanceMethods.Name: rulerMarkersForTextView:paragraphStyle:ruler:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an array of text ruler objects for the current selection.

InstanceMethods.Name: layoutManagerOwnsFirstResponderInWindow:
InstanceMethods.Description: Indicates whether the first responder in the specified window is a text view for the layout manager.

InstanceMethods.Name: defaultLineHeightForFont:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the default line height for a line of text that uses a specified font.

InstanceMethods.Name: defaultBaselineOffsetForFont:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the default baseline offset that the layout manager's typesetter uses for the specified font.

InstanceMethods.Name: addTemporaryAttributes:forCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Appends one or more temporary attributes to the attributes dictionary of the specified character range.

InstanceMethods.Name: addTemporaryAttribute:value:forCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Adds a temporary attribute to the characters in the specified range.

InstanceMethods.Name: setTemporaryAttributes:forCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets one or more temporary attributes for the specified character range.

InstanceMethods.Name: removeTemporaryAttribute:forCharacterRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Removes a temporary attribute from the list of attributes for the specified character range.

InstanceMethods.Name: temporaryAttribute:atCharacterIndex:effectiveRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the value for the temporary attribute of a character, and the range it applies to.

InstanceMethods.Name: temporaryAttribute:atCharacterIndex:longestEffectiveRange:inRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the value for the temporary attribute of a character, and the maximum range it applies to.

InstanceMethods.Name: temporaryAttributesAtCharacterIndex:effectiveRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the dictionary of temporary attributes for the specified character range.

InstanceMethods.Name: temporaryAttributesAtCharacterIndex:longestEffectiveRange:inRange:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the temporary attributes for a character, and the maximum range they apply to.

InstanceProperties.Name: delegate
InstanceProperties.Description: The layout manager’s delegate.

InstanceProperties.Name: textStorage
InstanceProperties.Description: The text storage object that contains the content to lay out.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsNonContiguousLayout
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layout manager allows noncontiguous layout.

InstanceProperties.Name: hasNonContiguousLayout
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layout manager currently has any areas of noncontiguous layout.

InstanceProperties.Name: showsInvisibleCharacters
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to substitute visible glyphs for whitespace and other typically invisible characters.

InstanceProperties.Name: showsControlCharacters
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layout manager substitutes visible glyphs for control characters in the layout.

InstanceProperties.Name: usesFontLeading
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layout manager uses the leading of the font.

InstanceProperties.Name: backgroundLayoutEnabled
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layout manager generates glyphs and lays them out when the app's run loop is idle.

InstanceProperties.Name: limitsLayoutForSuspiciousContents
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layout manager avoids laying out unusually long or suspicious input.

InstanceProperties.Name: usesDefaultHyphenation
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layout manager uses the default hyphenation rules to wrap lines.

InstanceProperties.Name: textContainers
InstanceProperties.Description: The current text containers of the layout manager.

InstanceProperties.Name: glyphGenerator
InstanceProperties.Description: The glyph generator that the layout manager uses.

InstanceProperties.Name: numberOfGlyphs
InstanceProperties.Description: The number of glyphs in the layout manager.

InstanceProperties.Name: extraLineFragmentRect
InstanceProperties.Description: The rectangle for the extra line fragment at the end of a document.

InstanceProperties.Name: extraLineFragmentTextContainer
InstanceProperties.Description: The text container for the extra line fragment rectangle.

InstanceProperties.Name: extraLineFragmentUsedRect
InstanceProperties.Description: The rectangle that encloses the insertion point in the extra line fragment rectangle.

InstanceProperties.Name: defaultAttachmentScaling
InstanceProperties.Description: The default amount of scaling to apply when an attachment image is too large to fit in a text container.

InstanceProperties.Name: firstTextView
InstanceProperties.Description: The first text view in the layout manager’s series of text views.

InstanceProperties.Name: textViewForBeginningOfSelection
InstanceProperties.Description: The text view that contains the first glyph in the selection.

InstanceProperties.Name: typesetter
InstanceProperties.Description: The current typesetter.

InstanceProperties.Name: typesetterBehavior
InstanceProperties.Description: The default typesetter behavior.
